testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Entrepreneurs, investors, and content creators are turning their ideas into successful businesses
testimonials.quote1: The analysis I received was surprisingly accurate. I identified problems in my business model that I hadn't even noticed.
testimonials.quote2: I saved months of research and thousands of dollars validating my idea. The report helped me pivot my strategy.
testimonials.quote3: As an angel investor, I use Startupideia to pre-analyze startups that come to me. It's an indispensable tool.

pricing.title: Plans & Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your entrepreneurial needs

free.name: Free
free.description: For beginners who want to validate their first idea.

entrepreneur.name: Entrepreneur
entrepreneur.description: Perfect for starters with multiple ideas.

business.name: Business
business.description: For teams and companies needing advanced analyses.

hero.title: Transform ideas into businesses
hero.subtitle: Discover the viability of your idea and receive a complete action plan to turn it into a successful business.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple and efficient process to transform your idea into a viable business plan

step1.title: Describe your idea
step1.description: Answer some questions about your business idea, such as target audience, problem it solves, and monetization model.

step2.title: We process the data
step2.description: Advanced algorithms process your idea, analyzing viability, market, and growth potential.

step3.title: Receive complete insights
step3.description: Get a detailed analysis with suggestions for name, slogan, ideal persona, MVP, and monetization strategies.

step4.title: Make informed decisions
step4.description: Use the insights to refine your idea, create an action plan, and start your business with more confidence.

features.title: Validate your idea completely
features.subtitle: Our platform provides a complete analysis of the viability and potential of your business concept.

viabilityAnalysis.title: Viability Analysis
viabilityAnalysis.description: Detailed evaluation based on market, trends, and practical applicability of your idea.

nameSloganPitch.title: Name, Slogan and Pitch
nameSloganPitch.description: Creative suggestions to present your business in an impactful and memorable way.

modelEvaluation.title: Model Evaluation
modelEvaluation.description: Analysis of your business model with strengths and opportunities for improvement.

nichePersona.title: Niche and Persona
nichePersona.description: Identification of your ideal target audience and creation of a detailed persona.

mvpSuggestion.title: MVP Suggestion
mvpSuggestion.description: Recommendations to create a minimum viable product that validates your idea quickly.

recommendedStack.title: Recommended Stack
recommendedStack.description: Suggestion of the best tools and technologies for developing your project.

monetizationPotential.title: Monetization Potential
monetizationPotential.description: Strategies to generate revenue with your business in a sustainable way.

competitionDifferentials.title: Competition and Differentials
competitionDifferentials.description: Competitive analysis and identification of factors that highlight your business in the market.

ideaForm.title: Share your idea
ideaForm.subtitle: Fill out the form and receive a detailed analysis of the business potential

cta.title: Ready to transform your idea into reality?
cta.subtitle: Our platform is waiting to analyze the potential of your next big business. Start right now!

footer.description: Transform your ideas into viable businesses with analyses powered by advanced technology.
